title: AI Engineer Intern (Hybrid) - June 2025
description:

Weâ€™re searching for you: fresh talent with new ideas, innovation, passion, and drive to bring to Staples. We have student and graduate opportunities where youâ€™ll help the Staples, Inc. organization be more successful and productive while building a purposeful career. Whether you are looking for a summer internship, co-op, or an entry-level role, weâ€™ll help you develop the technical and soft skills you need to thrive in the future.
This intern position requires you to be in a hybrid working model (at least 3 days in the office, and 2 days remote) based at the Staples, Inc. Corporate Headquarters in Framingham, MA.Â 
Target Start Date: June 2, 2025 - August 15, 2025 (11-week program) Â 
Position Overview:
The AI Engineer Intern will join the team to help reimagine Staples' systems and design the next generation of AI applications. They will collaborate with a team of engineers to develop intelligent AI systems, create prototypes, and bring machine learning applications to production. Responsibilities include writing software leveraging data and AI tooling/frameworks, testing for quality, deploying models to the cloud, and analyzing data to build predictive models, agents, their orchestrations, and AI features. The intern will also be responsible for developing and engineering AI systems and solutions that drive innovation and improve operational efficiency. They will work closely with data scientists, ML engineers, and business stakeholders to translate business needs into robust AI solutions.Â 
What you'll be doing:

Design, develop, test, and deploy AI models and systems using various frameworks and tools.
